content:
Doron
Doron or Dorio, as it is said to be written in some manuscripts, is a city mentioned only by Pliny and located in Cilicia Tracheia,[1] Some scholars have equated the city to Darieium or Dorieium in Phrygia mentioned by Stephanus of Byzantium.[2]

References

 This article incorporates text from a publication now in the public domain: Smith, William, ed. (1854–1857). "Doron" . Dictionary of Greek and Roman Geography. London: John Murray.CS1 maint: ref=harv (link)
